title: Ep 53: I Saw The Sign with Heidi Rose Robbins
itunes:title: Ep 53: I Saw The Sign with Heidi Rose Robbins
itunes:subtitle: This week, Kate and Doree review the intentions they set six months ago and discuss new ones for 2019. Plus, they talk making vision boards, day trips to the beach, and other ways to usher in the new year.Then they welcome Heidi Rose Robbins, an esote...
description:
This week, Kate and Doree review the intentions they set six months ago and discuss new ones for 2019. Plus, they talk making vision boards, day trips to the beach, and other ways to usher in the new year.

Then they welcome Heidi Rose Robbins, an esoteric astrologer, poet, podcaster, and leader of Radiant Life Retreats. She explains what Mercury in retrograde is really about, analyzes Kate and Doree’s birth charts, and breaks down how getting in touch with our astrological signs can help us deepen relationships.

Follow us on Instagram: @Forever35podcast,@katespencer,@doree, Twitter:@forever35pod, and in ourFacebook group(password is "serums"). All products mentioned on the show can be found on our website, Forever35podcast.com. To leave us a voicemail, call 781-591-0390, or you can email us at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

  • HoneyBook - For 50% off your first year of HoneyBook, visit honeybook.com and use promo code forever35.
  • Hourglass Cosmetics - For free shipping with your purchase of Caution Mascara visit hourglasscosmetics.com/forever35 and use promo code forever35
  • Calm - For a limited time, visit calm.com/forever35 to receive 25% off a Calm Premium Subscription.
  • Skillshare -Visit skillshare.com/forever35 to get two months of unlimited access to Skillshare classes for free.


Theme music by Riot.
